document_data.name: Tethra
document_data.mainbody: '''Tethra''' was an extra-planar [[fomorian]] who came to be in the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]] during the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-MoMDtime}}
document_data.History: The [[giant]] originally came from some other world, but ultimately ended up in Myth Drannor after passing through a ''[[portal]]'' caused by its unstable ''[[mythal]]''. It then resided in the north-west part of the city, near the [[Burial Glen]].
